meta.title: Express Web Development
meta.description: If you need to build a solid, reliable HTML-layout for a website or e-mail newsletter based on your design, you came to the right place.

greeting.title:
Express
Web Development
greeting.description:
If you need to build a solid, reliable
HTML-layout for a website or e-mail newsletter based on your design, you came to the right place.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.text1: Since 2012, CSSSR has been doing front-end web development for Asian and European companies. We provide fixed-cost services for web projects from any kind of business: start-ups, digital or creative agencies, IT companies and anybody else that needs our help.
aboutUs.text2: Our core service is creating HTML layouts, JavaScript animations and Retina Ready adaptive web pages from PSD, Sketch and Figma.

workflow.title: Two Days to Start
workflow.text1: Estimate the cost of your project using our Calculator and fill out the application form.
workflow.text2: Within one working day we’ll give you an estimate, and send you contract and NDA templates as well as some additional questions.
workflow.text3: You provide us your company details, answer our questions and ask any of your own.
workflow.text4: Within a day we’ll send you a finalized contract, a commercial offer and a prepayment invoice.
workflow.text5: Once the documents are signed and prepayment received, we’ll quickly assemble a team and begin work.

fieldset2.title: Layout
fieldset2.note: If your site has differing layouts for different versions (mobile, alternative desktop,etc), please specify the number of layouts per page.

fieldset3.title: Browser Support
fieldset3.subtitle: Last versions of Google Chrome, Firefox, Apple Safari, Microsoft Edge + iOS — Safari and Android — Chrome
fieldset3.note: Please enter any additional browsers that you want to be supported.

fieldset5.title: Interactivity Options
fieldset5.note:
Websites are complex, with hundreds of variables.
This is an approximate estimate based on previous projects. Hire us for a more refined estimate.

feature1.title: Design‑Friendly
feature1.text: Your project will look exactly like it’s supposed to. We understand the design processes and respect every pixel in your mock-ups.

feature2.title: Modern Stack
feature2.text1: We use only modern stack from open-source technologies to make your project work quickly and efficiently, and allow for easy future support.
feature2.text2: HTML5, CSS3, Stylus, Pug, BEM, PostCSS

feature3.title: Accessibility
feature3.text: Did you know that over 10% of users have special needs when using the Internet? We’ve got you covered. We apply a11y principles to all our projects.

feature4.title: Quality Control
feature4.text: At least three specialists are assigned to your project regardless of its size: a manager, a developer and a QA-engineer.

feature5.title: Guarantees
feature5.text: Our in-house lawyer customizes contracts and NDAs for each project.
